@notice that are queued to be distributed on a `queueNewRewards` call
@dev rewards are queued when an account `_updateReward`.

earned(address).details: earning are based on lock duration and boost

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

queueNewRewards(uint256).details: Triger rewardRate recalculation using _amount and queuedRewards
queueNewRewards(uint256).notice: Add new rewards to be distributed over a week

queuedRewards().notice: that are queued to be distributed on a `queueNewRewards` call

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

rewardPerToken().details: gives the total amount of rewards distributed since inception of the pool per vault token

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

queuedRewards.details: rewards are queued when an account `_updateReward`.
